00035 void EventHandlerMasterConnection::run() {
00036 
00037   while (true) {
00038     try {
00039       m_master_client_ptr->register_server(m_location);
00040       break;
00041     }
00042     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00043       HT_ERRORF("Problem registering ourselves (%s) with the Master - %s - %s",
00044                 m_location.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00045     }
00046     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00047   }
